traits.name: Hold Still
traits.desc: When you hit a target with an attack and the target moved a not distance of 10 ft. or less during it's last turn, you deal 1d6 additional damage.

traits.name: Greatbow
traits.desc: +7 to hit, range 60/150 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Twin Slash
traits.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., two targets, or the same target twice. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.name: Vital Shot
traits.desc: +7 to hit, range 60/150 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage and the target takes ongoing 2d8 bleeding damage (DC 13 Constitution saving throw).
